name: Anne's Hot Ham and Swiss Dip
author: KRISTLE
summary: My friend gave me this recipe for a hot, easy appetizer. It is very simple to make for get-togethers. If you like hot ham and Swiss sandwiches, you will love this!
ingredients: 1 pound thinly sliced deli ham, sliced into thin strips
1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, cut into cubes
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of celery soup, undiluted
directions: In a slow cooker, combine the ham, cream cheese, cream of mushroom soup and cream of celery soup
Cover, and cook on Low until cheese is melted, about 2 hours, stirring occasionally
